title: U.S. teens : most frequently accessed social networks 2019
yAxis: Share of respondents who use network most often
summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Platform, and Share of respondents who use network most often in each Platform on the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents who use network most often 25.0 is found at Platform Instagram and the minimum is found at Other where Platform is 1.0.
The highest Platform Instagram has 24.0 more Share of respondents who use network most often than the lowest Platform Other.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents who use network most often for 9 number of Platforms.
The Share of respondents who use network most often is appeared to be the highest at Platform Instagram and lowest at Platform Other.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Platform, and Share of respondents who use network most often in each Platform on the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents who use network most often 25.0 is found at Platform Instagram and the minimum is found at Other where Platform is 1.0.
The highest Platform Instagram has 24.0 more Share of respondents who use network most often than the lowest Platform Other.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents who use network most often for 9 number of Platforms.
The maximum Share of respondents who use network most often 25.0 is found at Platform Instagram and the minimum is found at Other where Platform is 1.0.
The second highest Share of respondents who use network most often is appeared to be the Platform Facebook.
There is a difference of 24.0 between the maximum Platform Instagram and minimum Platform Other.
Share of respondents who use network most often at Platform Instagram is 25.0 , second place is Facebook at 24.0, and thirdly is Snapchat at 22.0.
Platform Other, and Don't know share the same value 1.0.
The lowest value 1.0 at Other is almost 2.25 times smaller than the average value 11.11.
The Share of respondents who use network most often is 100.0 if we add up values of all Platforms.
